Feat.Name: Armor Proficiency, Light
Feat.Description: You are skilled at wearing light armor.
Feat.Benefit: When you wear a type of armor with which you are proficient, the armor check penalty for that armor applies only to Dexterity- and Strength-based skill checks.
Feat.Special: All characters except monks, sorcerers, and wizards automatically have Light Armor Proficiency as a bonus feat. They need not select it.
